Directions: after cleansing and toning, dispense serum onto fingers and gently massage into skin. Gentle for day and night use. Regular use will protect, balance, and hydrate your skin.

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
